description: A Flutter app main file defining the app's structure, theme, and home page. It contains the root widget and a stateful home page displaying a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, setting up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a dynamic title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State management class for MyHomePage, building the UI with AppBar and Centered Column.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, initiating runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: MyApp.build
methods.description: Build method returning the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

methods.name: MyHomePage.createState
methods.description: Creates the state object for MyHomePage.

methods.name: _MyHomePageState.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the home page, displaying app title and a loading indicator.
